attributes.action: Make correct pronunciation of the English language
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick to death of people not pronouncing the English Language correctly, if you live in this country & claim our benefits & live ofF my tax payers money you should at least be able to speak & pronounce the language we speak(Eg:Wanting,English Language not Vanting)

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
